author: ampercy
title: SPO Training Lab in Uganda
description: Unreliable infrastructure and high cost of setting up a robust Cardano testnet in developing nations for aspiring SPO's and developers.
solution: Creating a computer lab space that provides hands-on practical knowledge on how to set up, run and maintain a Cardano stake pool.
experience: IT and software professionals based in Uganda and Canada with experience running businesses and facilitating technical training in Uganda.
